page.title: 16RECREATION IN DELABOLE
page.content: {"My favourite hobby": survey results by Peter Osborne. Swimming came top with 9 votes bike riding had 7 votes, jogging and drawing had 6 each, horse riding had 4, reading, gardening, colouring, stamp-collecting and watching TV each had 2 votes. Others included fishing, birdwatching, walking and playing records. {"Fishing"}by Shane Binney. "I go fishing in the sea but I like fishing in a boat best with a hand line. Peter thinks beach casting is best.You need a float and a ball weight.You can have lots of different hooks.I have two rods.One is a river fishing rod.I catch my own bait & I catch mackerel and pollack."
